you have permission to touch me.

Let us measure for another ten minutes.
There is nothing wrong with having more data.
You said so yourself, did not you, Yukimura-kun?
That is some crazy stuff you are doing there, you two.
This has nothing to do with you.
So, what is this experiment about?
We were doing an experiment to find proof of whether one party loves another or not.
Himuro-senpai's in love, you see, with Yukimura-senpai.
W-We have not established that for certain yet.
We were just monitoring Yukimura-kun's heart rate.
Himuro-senpai, yours was high, but is not his higher?
Yukimura-kun, your heart was racing pretty fast, too.
Did you run a control in your experiment?
If you are referring to resting heart rate, we did measure that.
What do you mean by control?
Is A responding to B with an increased heart rate?
Is A responding to B with an increased heart rate?
This is the objective of the experiment you were running.
To investigate this, you need to run an experiment where B is not there for comparison.
Right now, you are comparing results to an experiment where A is doing nothing.
A gets close to B and pats head.
This is called a negative control.
It is used as a scientific control when no response is expected.
A gets close to B and pats head.
In this case, comparison to a situation in which the other party is C is also necessary.
A gets close to C and pats head.
A gets close to B and pats head.
A gets close to C and pats head.
Otherwise, you cannot prove that the other party must be B.
A gets close to C and pats head
A gets close to B and pats head
In the experiment you were performing,
there is no way to tell if the given factors are affecting the results, so it is pretty pointless.
It might work at a reference level.
Let us begin an experiment now.

is he some scumbag jerk who gets excited with any woman?

State the measurement rounded to three significant figures!

but it is a lot easier to understand now, bear.

starting tomorrow, you can start referring to them as significant figures, bear.

in cooking, the important thing is the proper administration of affection!

Are you saying that something so insubstantial will make the food taste better?
I suppose an uber-novice cook like you would not understand.
Does love make food taste better?

This type of love changes the flavor.
Love type II (psychological love) Flavor is unchanged.
This type of affection affects the mind.
there are two systems of injecting affection into cooking.
He likes spicy food, so I will make it just a little spicy.
This type of affection changes the flavor.

Love type II (psychological love) Flavor is unchanged.
This type of affection affects the mind.
Something like that is never going to make food taste better.
Take two dishes which are exactly the same, A and B.
Depending on mental state and other factors, they can taste completely different.
I worked really hard to make this, so...
It is clear that dish A would taste better, right?
Please do not use me as a model without asking!

they have a device which can quantify flavor, a taste sensor, over at Keio YOU.
Should we use it to compare the flavor of dishes A and B?
But there is no such thing as a correct flavor,

one with love and one without, and set them out so that you cannot tell which is which,
